name: latextags
summary: Perl script to generate tags for LaTeX files.
description:
This is a perl script to generate tags
for Latex files. The script generates
tags for labels, newcommands and bibliography
items. 
This is script was derived from Michael Schaap's
pltags.pl script.
The format of the tags file is usable from VIM.

versions.release_notes:
fixed multiple braces bug, fix by Manoj, thanks!
Added some thoughts on how to integrate
into Vim.
